ygData.subject: runed totem?
ygData.msgSnippet: I purchased a runed totem staff from somebody last night for 20pp.  I was disappointed to find it was not the BIG staff I see some mages carry around.  It
ygData.messageBody:
I purchased a runed totem staff from somebody last night for 20pp. I
was disappointed to find it was not the BIG staff I see some mages
carry around. It looked no different from the cracked great staff
or fine steel great staff I was using. The one I'm looking for has
the crooked knot on top? Anybody know what that staff is?

Don't get me wrong, the runed totem staff is great and I think I got a
fairly good deal. But I've been jealously looking at other cool mages
with this big staff in their hands. I've got a list of creatures I'd
love to give a good WHACK on the backside to with this staff. :)

Good day,
-- LimDul
